author: angaz
content:
Hello guys, I'm looking at the definition of the `Hello` message, and I see there's a `ListenPort` which doesn't seem to be set or used, at least in Geth. I can see Nethermind and Besu set this value, but Geth and Erigon doesn't.
According to the definition: https://github.com/ethereum/devp2p/blob/master/rlpx.md#hello-0x00, a 0 specifies the client is not listening. I guess that's referring to the p2p server.
Do the client that set this value use it for anything? Should it be get in Geth?
